column1: Stop it! Stop it! Stop it!
And you Romanian leaders , you don't care about us! All you care about is making America look stupid!
And you protesters! Don't you have anything better to do?! Get a life!
And you boys are the worst of all!

You know nothing about Romania, and yet you assume America is so much better! Maybe Romania isn't as nice as America, but it is our home! We are Romanian! All you care about is your own stupid circus!
